articles.description: Only a small number of people who get their first shot of the Pfizer / BioNTech or Moderna COVID-19 vaccine don’t get their second dose, CDC data shows. Experts were worried there would be a gap.
articles.content:
Nearly everyone was fully vaccinated in the recommended window
Photo by Andrew Caballero-Reynolds / AFP via Getty Images

articles.title: Montgomery County Vaccine Updates: Wait List, Key Dates, More - Patch.com
articles.description: The county was unable to open its third vaccine site last week as planned, and no supply increase was seen, but important steps were taken.
